GSP28jsbh3-1u:6: tadevaṃ ṣaṭpramāṇake karmabhede nirūpite saṃprati śeṣinirūpitaṃ śeṣatvāparaparyāyamaṅgatvaṃ nirūpyate /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:7: bhinnānāṃ hi tat saṃbhavati nābhinnānāmiti tannirūpaṇasya tatra hetutvam /

GSP28jsbh3-1u:9: tathāpiaṅgatvasāmānādhikaraṇyena hetutāmādāyaiva saṅgatyupapattāvavacchedakāvacchedena tadasattve 'pi na kaścidvirodhaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:28: yadyapyatra guroḥ kṛtāvapi mayāpyudbhāvyate kācanā- saṃbhūtistadapi pracāracature naiṣā purobhāgitā /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:29: kintu kṣmātilakāḥ kuśāgradhiṣaṇāḥ siddhāntabaddhādarāḥ madvākyaṃ parihṛtya tatkṛtimalaṅkurvantviyaṃ me matiḥ // 4 //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:31: tathāpi jijñāsāsūtre śabdena nirdiṣṭasyaiva pūrvaprakṛtaniyame satyadhyayanasya pūrvaṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:42: evamathaśabdārthaṃ sūcayan sukhagrahaṇāya vṛttavartiṣyamāṇārthaṃ pratijānīte ------- tadevamiti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:46: pratyuta prādhānyāt śeṣinirūpaṇameva kartuṃ yuktamitisūtre śeṣalakṣaṇamityuktamayuktamityāśaṅkānirāsāya ------- śeṣinirūpitetyādyuktam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:49: ca śeṣatva eva vyāpārāt tatsamavāye balābalasya ca śeṣiṇyaviruddhatvena śeṣa eva
GSP28jsbh3-1u:52: etena ------- śeṣitvajñānasya nāntarīyasiddhikatvamupapāditavatopi somanāthasya tannirūpaṇe 'pyadhyāyārthatvoktiḥ vārtikaviruddhatvāt ---------- apāsteti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:54: śeṣatvamaṅgatvaṃ lakṣyate yenādhyāyena taṃ vakṣyāma iti sūtrārthamabhipretyāha --------- śeṣatveti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:57: dadhyādidravyāṇāṃ tathā karmaṇāṃ lokasiddhabhedavatāṃ dvitīye 'nirūpitabhedānāṃ mithaḥ aṅgāṅgibhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:58: karmaṇāmeva mitho 'ṅgāṅgibhāvanirūpaṇasya dvitīyādhyāyasiddhabhedanirūpaṇādhīnatvāt sāmānādhikaraṇyena saṅgatyupapattyā pariharati tathāpīti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:59: dravyādyaṅgatvanirūpaṇasya asmin pakṣe asaṅgatyāpattiṃ parihartuṃ pakṣāntaramāha ------- aṃśa eveti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:62: tataśca śeṣatvalakṣaṇapratijñayaiva tatsaṃbandhivicārajātasya kariṣyamāṇasya sarvasya pratijñāyā apyadhyāyārthatvānna tasyāsaṅgatirityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:63: tatra bhāṣye kaḥ śeṣaḥ kena hetunā śeṣaḥ kathaṃ ca viniyujyate ityādīni ca viniyoge kāraṇānīha vakṣyante /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:66: tatra ḥśeṣaḥ parārthatvādḥiti uttarasūtre pañcamyantena hetūpādānadvārā lakṣaṇasyoktasya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:70: yena pravṛttinimittena hetunā śeṣapadaṃ prayājādiṣu prayujyate,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:81: yadeva hi aṅgatvalakṣaṇaṃ tadeva śeṣapadaśakyatāvacchedakaṃ nānyat /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:84: svargoddeśapravṛttapuruṣakṛtau yāgānukūlāyāṃ kārakatvena vidhyanvayācca yāge lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:85: pradhānoddeśapravṛttapuruṣakṛtau prayājādyanukūlāyāṃ prayājādeḥ kārakatvena vidhyanvayācca prayājādāvapi saḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:87: ṣaṣṭhīsthale ca saṃbandhasāmānyābhidhāne 'pi kārakatva eva paryavasānānnāvyāptiḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:93: yathācāsya na kvāpyavyāptyativyāptī tathā kaustubhe vistaraḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:104: vidhirhi viśiṣṭabhāvanāṃ vidadhadarthādviśeṣaṇānyapi vidhatte iti sarveṣāmuddeśyatvena vidheyatvena vā vidhyanvayaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:107: (B2) prayājādau śeṣapadavācyatānumāne parārthatvasya pañcamyā hetutvābhidhānāt tasyaiva śeṣapadaśakyatāvacchedakatvam,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:110: yacca yena vinā yanna bhavati sa bījādiraṅkurādeḥ śeṣa ityevamavinābhāvahetukaṃ śeṣatvaṃ parairucyate,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:111: tannirākartuṃ “śeṣaḥ parārthatvādi” tisūtreṇa pārārthyarūpaṃ śeṣatvamuktaṃ jaimininā /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:121: ataḥ pārārthyasyāpi nirvacanānarhatvānna tallakṣaṇatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyata āha -------- tatreti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:125: kṛtau kārakatvena hetunā tadviśiṣṭakṛtau vidhyanvaye satyarthāt viśeṣaṇībhūte yāge vidhyanupraveśena vidhyanvayādvihitatvaṃ yāge iti lakṣaṇasamanvaya ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:126: saptamādye svargoddeśena prayājādīnāṃ vidhānāśaṅkānirākaraṇapūrvakaṃ pariplavatvaṃ nirākariṣyate,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:128: dravyasya kriyānivartakatvena guṇasya dravyaparicchedakatvena kārakatayā vidhānāt karaṇatvenānvayāt tatrāpi tadanvayaṃ darśayati --------- dravyeti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:129: etacca kramasyāpi padārthaparicchedakatvena kārakatayā vidhānāt tasyāpyupalakṣaṇam //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:131: yathādhvaryavamiti samākhyākalpitavidhau adhvaryoḥ ṣaṣṭhyā saṃbandhamātrāvagame 'pi tasya kartṛtve paryavasānerna kartṛtayā tattatpadārthāṅgatvamityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:132: nimittasyānuṣṭhāpakatayā uddeśyatvenānvayāt nimittoddeśapravṛttakṛtikārakatvena vihitatvasya yāge sattvānnimittāṅgatvaṃ nirasitumāha ---------- nimittasyeti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:138: atraca kṛtikārakatvamityetāvanmātroktau phalasyāpi karmatāsaṃbandhena kṛtikārakatvāt phalāṅgatvāpattiḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:140: phalasyaca phalaṃ prati paratvābhāvāt phaloddeśapravṛttapuruṣakṛtau karmatayā phalasya vidhyanvayena bhoktraṅgatve 'pi na phalāṅgatvaprasaktiḥ,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:142: apūrvasyāpi phaloddeśapravṛttakṛtau karaṇatvenānvayāt phalāṅgatvopapattirityādi kaustubhe draṣṭavyo vistara ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:145: bhāvanādipratītiḥ kṛteḥ kṛtyantarābhāvāt yāgasya bhāvanāṃ prati tasyāśca phalaṃ prati
GSP28jsbh3-1u:146: śabdabhāvanāyāśca arthabhāvanāṃ prati paśvādeśca kārakaṃ prati kārakatvasyaca kriyāṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:148: yattu prakāśakāraiḥ ------ bhāvanāyāḥ phalāṅgatvādivyavahārasya mukhyatvasiddhau iṣṭoddeśyapravartanāprayojyatvaṃ svasveṣṭaṃ pratyaṅgatvam,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:150: pravartanākāryaṃ pravṛttistatkāryañca yāgaphalādi svasveṣṭaṃ pratyaṅgam ------- ityuktam,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:154: yadapi bhāṭṭālaṅkārakṛtā --------- vidhyanvayinyāṃ kṛtau yadviṣayatvānupapattiryaduddeśyakatvena parihriyate tat tasyāṅgaṃ tadarthamiti -------
GSP28jsbh3-1u:156: kāloddeśena karmaṇa eva kṛtiviṣayatvāṅgīkāreṇa karmaṇaḥ kālāṅgatvāpattyā kālasya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:161: atraca vyāpārabhedena kārakāṇāṃ bhedāt tadghaṭitāṅgatvasyāpi pratipadārthaṃ bhedāvagamena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:162: tattadaṅgatvaṃ prati prayājatvādereva lakṣyatāvacchedakatvaṃ sūcayituṃ lakṣaṇe yattacchabdopādānam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:163: kṛtikārakatvena vidhyanvayitvarūpapārārthyasya śrutyādipramāṇāni vinā vaktumaśaktestānyapyarthādiha upakṣiptānīti dhyeyam // //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:168: samānapadaśrutyā yāgādereva bhāvanābhāvyatvena tasya svargoddeśena vihitatvābhāvāt /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:171: svargakāmapadasya tu strīkāmaḥ prāyaścittaṃ kuryāditivat kartṛparatvādināpyupapatterna bhāvyaparatvāvaśyakatā /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:178: upakārakalpanayā śeṣatvopapattiriti teṣāmeva lakṣyatvamiti prāpte ----- nopakārakatvaṃ śeṣatvam,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:181: apakārakasthale tu tadapakārasyaiveṣṭatvenoddeśyatā na tu tasyeti na tadarthe 'pyapakārake śeṣatvavyavahāraḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:184: tathāhi -------- yadyapi vidheḥ svarūpayogyatayaiva pravṛttyanukūlatvaṃ liṅāvagamyate;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:185: tathāpi kadācit pravṛttyabhāve vidhivaiyarthyāpatteravaśyaṃ kadācittayā bhavitavyam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:186: tadā ceṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ vinā tadasaṃbhavāttasya ca bādhakābhāve bhramatvāyogādiṣṭasādhanatvaṃ tāvadyāgasyavidhibalādavagamyate,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:192: puruṣaḥ punaḥ kartṛtvādinā yāgādyuddeśyakakṛtikārakatvādvākyādeva tadaṅgaṃ ityavivādameva // 3 //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:194: (B2) atroktasya lakṣaṇasya lakṣyapradarśanadvārā kaḥ śeṣa ityayamaṃśo nirūpyata ityabhipretyāha -------- yadyapīti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:196: vinā ajananāt tadākṣepāvaśyaṃbhāve iṣṭoddeśena sādhanatayā vidhānasaṃbhavāt kathaṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:201: kāmye karmaṇi kāmanāyāṃ satyāmapi vidhiśataśravaṇe 'pi kadācitpravṛttyajananāt /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:202: ataśca pravṛttijanane yogyamātrasya vidheḥ svaviṣaye iṣṭoddeśyakakṛtikārakatvānākṣepakatvānna yāgādeḥ pārārthyasiddhirityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:203: nanu svargakāmapadena svargasya uddeśyatvāvagame satyarthādyāgasya bhāvyāṃśopanipātāsaṃbhavāt karaṇatvenaiva vidhānānnānupapattirityata āha -------- svargakāmeti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:204: evañca yāgasyaiva bhāvyatvāt svargakāmasya kartṛtvenānvayāt phalābhāvānna yāgasya phalāṅgatvam navā phalasya puruṣāṅgatvam,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:205: puruṣasya tu kartṛtvenānvayāt yāgāṅgatvamityabhipretyopasaṃharati --------- ata iti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:207: makṣikānivṛttyartheṣu dhūmeṣu makṣikārtho dhūma iti pratīteḥ parārthatve vidyamāne 'pi makṣikāśeṣatvavyavahārābhāvāt apakārakavyāvṛttamupakārakatvameva śeṣatvam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:208: tacca yatra pratyakṣādināvagamyate tatraiva saṃbhavatīti na yāgāderlakṣyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:212: vrīhīniti dvitīyā śrutiḥ tadantapadasya prokṣatīti samabhivyāhāro vākyaṃ tābhyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:214: evakāreṇa yāgasya prayājādervā pratyakṣadvitīyāvākyebhyaḥ upakārakatvādarśanāt alakṣyatvaṃ sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:222: yathā jāteṣṭau pūta eva tejasvītyupasaṃhāraikavākyatārūpapramāṇasattve putra ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:224: bhoktuḥ pravṛttapuruṣāpekṣayā paratvābhāvāduddeśyatayā vidhyanvayāśravaṇācca taduddeśapravṛttakṛtikarmatvarūpamukhyāṅgatvāsaṃbhavāt bhākta ityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:227: pūrvapakṣe 'pi bādariṇā dravyāṇāṃ śeṣatvasyāṅgīkārāt puruṣasya dravyātvenāṅgatve
GSP28jsbh3-1u:228: nobhayorvivāda iti puruṣaśca karmārthatvāditi punaḥ sūtrapraṇayanavaiyarthyamavivādamevetyanena sūcitam //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:229: prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe prayājādīnāmaṅgatve prakaraṇādipramāṇābhāvāt arthavādikasya svargasya vā phalatvakalpanayā prādhānyānnātideśaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:235: tatra śrutirnāmāṅgatvaghaṭakībhūtoddeśyatā --------- kṛtikārakatvayoranyatarasya prādhānyena vācakaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:240: vāraṇo yajñāvacara ityādau vākyīya eva viniyogo na tu śrautaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:241: tatra dvitīyā uddeśyatvaparā satī prokṣaṇāderaṅgatve hetuḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:242: vastutastu r-------- ipsitatvākhyāyā uddeśyatāyāḥ sādhyatāmātravācidvitīyāvācyatvābhāvāttatrāpi na mukhyā śrutiḥ,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:246: evaṃ ṣaṣṭhyādāvapi kārakatvaśaktatvābhāvāt śrutitvavyavahāro bhākta eva /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:248: tatrāpi vākyīya eva viniyogo na śrautaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:250: tadevaṃ śruterviniyojakatve tadbhūtādhikaraṇenaiva siddhe 'dhunā gauṇamukhyasādhāraṇaśrutiviniyogopayogya- ṅgāṅgitayoravacchedakavicāraḥ kriyate
GSP28jsbh3-1u:267: tathātve vrīhitvādivivakṣāyā āvaśyakatve nīvārādiṣvanāpatteriti prāpte ---------- yadyapi vidhiraviśeṣapravṛttaḥ syāt;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:277: tattadvyāpārakasādhanatā eva ca vivakṣyante na tu sādhanatāvacchedakādīnyapi /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:283: (B2) atra prāthamikaśrutiviniyogopayoginirūpaṇasya prathamapādārthatvamabhipretya tṛtīyapratijñāviṣayībhūtārtha- nirūpaṇāt prathamataḥ śrutilakṣaṇamāha ------- tatreti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:285: prokṣitetiniṣṭhāpratyayena karmatvaviśiṣṭolūkhalamusalarūpadravyābhidhānena sākṣāt prādhānyena tadvṛttyuddeśyatāyā abodhanānna śrutyā prokṣaṇasya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:291: dvitīyātu na svaprakṛtyarthasya anyāṅgatvabodhikā kintu svaprakṛtyarthasya uddeśyatābodhanadvārā
GSP28jsbh3-1u:295: nanu -------- kṛtikārakaphalasya prādhānyena vācaka ityetāvallakṣaṇakaraṇe 'pi karmatvavācinyā dvitīyāyā mukhyaśrutitvamupapadyata eva,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:297: aṅgatvalakṣaṇe uddeśyapadopādānena tadatiriktatvenaiva kṛtikārakatvasya vivakṣaṇāt tasyāstatpramāṇatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:299: yuktaṃ caitat --------- nahi yasya prokṣaṇādeḥ karaṇatvena vrīhyaṅgatvaṃ bodhyate tatpramāṇaṃ dvitīyā bhavati;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:305: ataeva asminmate “ityaśvābhidhānīmādatte” ityatra satyapi vākyīye viniyoge śrutitvena liṅgabādha upapadyata ityāśayaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:311: vyavadhānamanapekṣya yacchabdajñānena janyate sā viniyoktrī śrutiriti śrutilakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:312: kṛtvā saṃbandhaścāṅgatvātmanā sādhanatvātmanā saṃbandhātmanā vā pratīyatāṃ na tadviśeṣalakṣaṇāpekṣyate,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:326: samāmnāya” iti sūtreṇa pratipādanāt śrutyā kriyānirūpitakārakatvasyārthādevopapatteḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:336: kathañca viniyujyata iti pratijñāyā ājyādivyāvṛttarūpāvacchinnoddeśena viniyujyate iti siddhāntena nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇāt tadvaiparītyena pūrvapakṣamāha -------- tatreti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:344: tadāca viśeṣaṇībhūtāpūrvaṃ pratyarthājjanakatvāvagamāt tasya cādṛṣṭarūpasya śrutasaṃskārairvinotpattau
GSP28jsbh3-1u:346: lakṣaṇīyasya rūpasya yaveṣvivājyādiṣvapi sattvāt sarvārthaṃ dharmāityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:347: nanu evamapūrvasādhanatvalakṣaṇāyāmapi vrīhijanyatvena pratyāsattyāgneyāvāntarāpūrvasādhanatvasyaiva lakṣaṇaucityāt tadasādhanājyādiṣu aprāptirityata āha -------- tatra phaleti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:355: prakṛtetu vrīhijanyayāgajanyatvasya paramāpūrve 'pi sattvena vrīhipadena tallakṣaṇāmātropapatteḥ nāvāntarāpūrvārthatvamityabhipretya vaiṣamyamāha -------- ata eveti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:362: nanu aviśeṣapravṛttavidhyanurodhena vairūpyāṅgīkaraṇaṃ sarvatraiva vādṛṣṭārthatvāṅgīkaraṇaṃ na doṣa ityata āha ------- kimuteti --------- pratyāsattyeti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:364: utpattyapūrvasādhanatvāt tadatikrame kāraṇābhāvāt yadeva vrīhyādibhiḥ sādhyamapūrvaṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:367: tadā agatyā tadvihāya paramāpūrvasādhanatvaṃ viprakṛṣṭamapi lakṣyeta,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:370: ata eva yatra saptadaśāratnitvādivyatirekeṇa prakṛtau apūrvasiddhiḥ paśvapūrvasiddhirvāvadhāritā tatra tadatikrameṇāpi paraṃparayā vājapeyāpūrvaprayojakatvamiṣyata
GSP28jsbh3-1u:381: tathaivajalāgnyādisaṃyogasya piṇḍaṃ prati nimittakāraṇatve 'pi na piṣṭādarthāntaraṃ puroḍāśaḥ,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:383: ataḥ sa taṇḍulaprakṛtika eveti na piṣṭasya vyāpāramadhye praveśaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:384: ataeva carau puroḍāśasthānāpanne piṣṭaprakṛtitvābhāve 'pi taṇḍulaprakṛtikatvādeva dharmaprāptyavighātaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:385: yadyapi yatra piṣṭasyaiva pradeyatā tatra taṇḍulaprakṛtikatvena dharmaprāptirdurnivārā;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:390: tasyābhāve peṣaṇavat lopaucityena anovāsovallaukikasyaiva piṣṭataṇḍulādeḥ upādānāttaṇḍuleṣviva
GSP28jsbh3-1u:391: na piṣṭe 'pi prayogamadhye taṇḍulopādānam na vā vrīhiprakṛtitvaniyama iti na taddharmaprāptiḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:394: nanu tattadvyāpārakasādhanatānāṃ āgneyatvavrīhitvāvacchinnānāṃ niveśe sauryādau tattaddharmāvacchinnasādhanatānāmabhāve
GSP28jsbh3-1u:397: apīha sādhanatāmātrapraveśena tatparihāropapattau na tadavacchedakānāṃ vrīhitvādīnāṃ praveśaḥ; gauravāt /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:401: nanu vrīhiyavayoḥ śabdāntarāt guṇādvā kāraṇatābhedāt vrīhigatataṇḍulaniṣpattivyāpārakasādhanatāśrayatvābhāve kathaṃ yaveṣu dharmaprāptiḥ?
GSP28jsbh3-1u:403: tadavacchinneṣu nīvāreṣu atideśena dharmalābhe 'pi prakṛtau tadabhāve na kathamapi
GSP28jsbh3-1u:405: yathaiva sādhanatāmātravivakṣayā'narthakyaparihāre sati na sādhanatāvacchedake vivakṣā; gauravāt,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:407: praviṣṭasyāpi na sādhanatāviśeṣasya vivakṣayā lakṣyatāvacchedake uddeśyatāvacchedake
GSP28jsbh3-1u:408: vā praveśo gauravāditi sādhanatāsāmānyāśrayatvavivakṣayā yuktā yaveṣu dharmaprāptirnājyādiṣviti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:414: sphyaśca kapālāni ceti daśa dravyāṇyanukramyaitāni vai daśa yajñāyudhānīti śrutena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:415: vākyena daśānāpi dravyāṇāṃ yajñasādhanatvena vidhānādutpattiśiṣṭa puroḍāśādyavarodhena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:419: pratyakṣavidhinā tṛtīyāśrutisahakṛtena sphyādīnāṃ viśiṣya viniyogād yajñāyudhavākyamevaikamaśrutavidhikaṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:427: pūrvādhikaraṇe nirūpya adhunā tṛtīyāśrutivikṛtaviniyogaprakāraṃ dravyaviṣaye nirūpayitumudāharati
GSP28jsbh3-1u:430: itikaraṇena prabhṛtyarthakena ca “agnihotrahavaṇīca śūrpañca kṛṣṇājinañca śamyā colūkhalañca musalaṃ ca dṛṣaccopalā ce” tyantasya saṅgrahaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:433: tātparyagrāhakasya sattvāt atiprasaktalakṣaṇāyāṃ na bādhakamiti viśeṣāśaṅkānirāsāya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:437: sphyenoddhantītyādīti ādipedana “kapāleṣu śrapayati agnihotrahavaṇyā havīṃṣi nirvapati
GSP28jsbh3-1u:438: śūrpeṇa vivinakti kṛṣṇājinamadhastādulūkhalamavastṛṇāti śamyāṃ dṛṣadyupadadhāti ulūkhalamusalābhyāmavahanti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:441: iha sphyādīnāṃ sarvārthatve nirākṛte caturthe punasteṣāṃ pradeyatvamāśaṅkya nirākriyata iti na virodhaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:447: jyotiṣṭome aruṇayā ekahāyanyā piṅgākṣyā somaṃ krīṇātīti śrutam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:454: yathācaivaṃ sati guṇavacanānāmāśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavantītyādyanuśāsanopapattistathā kaustubhe draṣṭavyam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:455: ekahāyanyādipadānāṃ tu bahuvrīhitvādavayavārthaviśiṣṭānyapadārtharūpe dravya eva śaktiriti prāñcaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:457: naca ------- dravyasyaikenaiva padena vidhisaṃbhave itareṇa vidhyanupapattirvaiyarthyaṃ ceti --------- vācyam;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:460: śakyate tvatrāpi āruṇyanyāyena lakṣaṇāpi neti vaktum;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:466: prāpte --------- na yogyatājñānaṃ śābdabodhaheturapi tu ayogyatāniścayasya pratibandhakatāmātram /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:481: na ca daśabhiḥ krīṇātīti vacanameva niveśatātparyagrāhakam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:483: na ca krayabhede 'pi ekasomaprāptyarthatvāviśeṣāt krayāntaradravye 'pi āruṇyasya niveśāśaṅkā /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:487: yathā caivaṃ sati trivatse sarvakrayadravyasthānāpanne niveśastathākaustubhe draṣṭavyam // 3 // 6 //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:489: (B2) pūrvaṃ dravyaviṣaye viniyogaprakāraṃ nirūpyādhunā guṇaviṣaye tannirūpayitumudāharati ---- jyotiṣṭoma iti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:491: aruṇāśabdasya dravyaparatve dravyasya krīṇātyanvayopapatteḥ pūrvapakṣāsaṃbhavaṃ nirasituṃ guṇavacanatvaṃ sādhayati ------ tatreti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:494: atra prācīnairaruṇādiśabdānāṃ kevalaṃ guṇavācitve śuklo devadatta itivat aruṇo ghaṭa
GSP28jsbh3-1u:495: iti sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteḥ rūpavān ghaṭa ityatreva matvarthīyenaiva sāmānādhikaraṇyāpatterākṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:497: ata eva “guṇavacanebhyo matupo lugiṣṭa” iti na tatprayogāpattiḥ ityuktam,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:498: tanna; prayogābhāvena sāṃpratikalakṣaṇāyā anupapattau nirūḍhalakṣaṇāyāḥ sutarāmanupapatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:504: evaṃ guṇamātravācitve 'pi teṣveva dravyalakṣaṇā nānyatreti niyamopapatterdravye lakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyopapattirnavātiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:508: itthamaruṇāpadasya dravyaparatvamuktamayuktamiti sūcayan tasyāṅgīkāre niṣprayojanatāndarśayati -------- tṛtīyayeti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:515: nāntyaḥ; tasya pāśādhikaraṇanyāyena sādhutvamātreṇāśrayaniṣṭhatayā vopapattau prātipadike lakṣaṇāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:516: ata eva sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbandhena tayoḥ karaṇatve prātipadikārthevānvaye saṃsargavidhayā pārṣṭhikabhāvena vā dravyabodhopapatternaiva lakṣaṇāyāstatra
GSP28jsbh3-1u:519: tadā viśeṣye dravye guṇasyānvayāpattyā tadviśiṣṭadravyasya mūrtatayaikahāyanyādivat
GSP28jsbh3-1u:524: tathā caturādiśabdānāmapi saṅkhyāviśiṣṭamuṣṭiparatvāpattau jaghanyāyā api muṣṭeḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:525: pradhānatvena tadanurodhasyaivāpattau mukhyatvena saptadaśaśarāve carau saṅkhyānugrahasya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:530: nanu kevalaguṇavācitve kathaṃ guṇavacanebhyo matupo lugiṣṭo guṇavacanānāmāśrayata ityanuśāsanadvayasyopapattiḥ?
GSP28jsbh3-1u:531: tatra guṇinamuktvā guṇavācakā ye teṣāmeva śuklādiśabdānāṃ guṇavacanapadena grahaṇena guṇiparatvāvaśyakatvādityata āha ------- yathācaivamiti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:533: dvitīye svaśakyārthaviśiṣṭavyaktiviṣayakalakṣaṇāvṛttiyogye yatprakāratayā vyakteranvayastadarthakaṃ guṇapadamiti tasyaiva guṇavacanaśabdenopādānamiti dvayoranuśāsanayorupapattiḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:534: atra yogyāntamātravivakṣāyāṃ ajāyāḥ śukla ityādāvapi ṭābādyāpattiḥ;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:537: ataeva tatrāśrayagataliṅgābhāve 'gaṇe śuklādayaḥ puṃsī' tyanena sādhutvārthaṃ puṃlliṅgameva niyamyate /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:541: tadgatastrītvenaiva ṭābādyutpatteḥ aruṇāśabdasyātra guṇaparatvameveti kaustubhe draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:544: saṃsargavidhayā bhātasya kartuḥ pacatītyasmāt eko naveti saṃśayavyudāsasiddhadharmitāvacchedakaviśiṣṭadharmijñānāvaśyakatvāya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:547: tāvatāpi dravyasya karaṇatayā prāpterviśeṣaṇāṃśasya guṇasyaiva karaṇatvāvaśyakatve
GSP28jsbh3-1u:550: yattu -------- aruṇatvajātiparatve tayā saha guṇe samavāyasaṃbandhasaṃbhavena lakṣaṇayā
GSP28jsbh3-1u:551: guṇaparatvasaṃbhave 'pi dravye tadabhāve vyaktilakṣaṇānupapattyā dravyaparasāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattiriti somanāthīye uktam,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:556: ata eva nīlaṃ rūpamiti pratīternīlarūpatvajāteḥ samavāyena vidyamānāyāḥ pravṛttinimittatvāśrayaṇaṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:557: tathaiva tasyā eva jāteḥ paraṃparāsaṃbandhena ghaṭādāvapyaṅgīkāre bādhakābhāvena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:558: muṅkhyayaiva vṛttyā prayoga upapādito nakṣatravādāvalyāṃ mīmāṃsakamūrdhanyena /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:559: tadā ko doṣaḥ paraṃparāsaṃbandhena lakṣaṇāśrayaṇa iti dik //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:562: tatra śaktiṃ kalpayitvā dravyaparatvameva matupa iva bahuvrīherapyāśrīyate /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:567: lakṣaṇāpakṣe bahuvrīheraruṇaśabdasya caikāntaritadravyalakṣakatvāṃśāviśeṣe hi kiṃ vinigamakam yadbahuvrīhereva dravyābhidhāyitā nāruṇapadasyeti,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:569: naca ------- indrapītaśabde pūrvapakṣe bahuvrīhāvanyapadārthalakṣaṇāpattidūṣaṇāprasakteḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣāpekṣayā daurbalyāsaṃbhavena kathaṃ pūrvapakṣotthānaṃ?
GSP28jsbh3-1u:570: iti ------- vācyam; ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣe bahuvrīhauca ekasyaivottarapadārthe anyavākyārthe cānvayasāmye 'pi ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣe ekasyaiva tyāgaḥ,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:571: bahuvrīhau tu ubhayoriti vaiṣamyeṇa tadapekṣayā tasya daurbalyasiddheḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:572: etena -------- bahuvrīdāvanyapadārthasya śakyatve vidyāprayuktyabhāvakṛtalāghavāt niṣādasthapatiśabde karmadhārayatyāgena bahuvrīhyāśrayaṇāpattirityapi --------- apāstam;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:575: ato yadyapi citrāḥ gāvo yasyeti vigraho loke prasiddhaḥ;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:576: tathāpi rājapuruṣa iti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyantapratipādye upasarjanatvasya prathamāntapratipādyārthe
GSP28jsbh3-1u:582: prādhānyena tatraiva śaktirna viśeṣaṇībhūtasaṃbandhe tasyākṣepādeva bhānasiddheḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:583: ataeva tṛtīyāntejāterdvitīyāntādisthaleca vyakteśca prādhānyadarśanāt niyāmakābhāve ākṛtyadhikaraṇanyāyapravṛttyā jātereva vācyatvaṃ vyakterākṣepalabhyatvameva
GSP28jsbh3-1u:586: ataeva sarvatreti vārtikamapyetādṛśaviṣaya eva viśeṣaṇībhūtasaṃbandhādiśaktinirākaraṇaparaṃ sat yatra yaugakasthale kṛdādivācakāntarasattvaṃ tadviṣayameva //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:587: yatratu bahuvrīhyādau navācakāntarasattvaṃ tatra yaṣṭīḥ praveśayetyādāviva padadvayasyaiva
GSP28jsbh3-1u:588: svārthaviśiṣṭānyapadārthe anyapadārthamātre vā nirūḍhalakṣaṇopapattau atiriktaśaktikalpane mānābhāvaḥ;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:590: ataeva yatra kṛdādāvapi prakṛtipratyayārthe lopo yathodbhidadhunetyādau tatrāvaśiṣṭabhāgasya tallakṣakatvamiṣṭameva,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:592: naca bahuvrīheranyapadārthaśaktatvābhāve aruṇāpadādaviśeṣāpattyā sūtre dravyaguṇayoriti nirdeśānupapattiḥ;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:594: evañca padadvaye lakṣaṇāṅgīkārādeva tatpuruṣāpekṣayā sutarāṃ karmadhārayāpekṣayā daurbalyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:596: siddhāntepica śaktyā parihāramanabhidhāya hutāhutasamudāyavācinaḥ indrapītaśabdasya tadavayave lakṣaṇāpattimātrameva pūrvapakṣadūṣaṇatvena darśitamiti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:597: naiyāyikādibahusaṃmataṃ pakṣāntaramāha -------- anyapadārtha iti yattu prakāśakāraiḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:602: ataeva yatra dvitīyāntādisthale tadasaṃbhavastatparameva matuppratyayānuśāsanavat bahuvrīhyanuśāsanamiti nadravye śaktirlakṣaṇā vā svīkāryā
GSP28jsbh3-1u:603: sautraṃ dravyapadañca pramāṇāntarapramitadravyapārṣṭhikasaṃbandhapratipādanatayāpyupapatt imadityabhipretya svasaṃmataṃ pakṣāntaramāha -------- śakyatetviti /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:606: asmiṃśca pakṣe amūrtatvāviśeṣāt sarveṣāmeva vicāraviṣayiteti bhāvaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:607: evaṃ prakṛtavicāropayuktaṃ prasādhya śābdabodhatvāvacchinnaṃ prati yogyatājñānasya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:609: bādhitvā “vihitastu sarvadharmaḥ syāt saṃyogato viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣā” diti teṣāmarthādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasūtratvena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:612: yatra agnihotrahavaṇyeti vākye lyuḍuktakaraṇībhūtasya dravyasya svavākyopāttanirvāpaṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:613: prati yogyatā tatra tasyā nirvāpāṅgatvasaṃbhave 'pi iha kārakatvena dravye amūrtatvena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:619: yattu vārtike --------- siddhasyāruṇyasya prakaraṇāgrahaṇamāśaṅkya aruṇayeti tṛtīyayā prākaraṇikāni jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasādhanāni somaprabhṛtīnyanūdya aruṇaprātipadikārtho vidhīyate /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:626: ityuktam; tat tṛtīyayā lakṣaṇayā dravyopādāne ekahāyanyā eva lakṣaṇāpatteḥ paraṃparāsaṃbandhena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:628: etena --------- ekahāyanyādipadānāṃ dravyaparatvāt śrautatadavaruddhe kraye aruṇāpadalakṣyadravyavidhyasaṃbhava iti śāstradīpikoktaṃ --------
GSP28jsbh3-1u:634: kintvayogyatāviścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ iti tadabhāvasya kāraṇatvena prakṛte 'pi tāvanmātreṇa
GSP28jsbh3-1u:638: āruṇyasya kriyānvayāt pūrvaṃ dravyānvaye kārakatvavyāghātāpatteḥ prathamato dravyaparicchedarūpavyāpārānavagame
GSP28jsbh3-1u:645: yadyapi kevalaguṇavācitvapakṣe bhinnapravṛttinimittānāṃ śabdānāmekasminnarthe pravṛttyasaṃbhavāt naikahāyanīpadasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃbhavati;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:646: tathāpi mukhyasyāsaṃbhave 'pi dravyaparicchedadvārā guṇasya karaṇatvenānvaye tasya
GSP28jsbh3-1u:649: ataeva pārṣṭhikānvayasamarthanānantaram “evañca vākyagatamapi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ samarthitaṃ bhavatī” tyuktaṃ vārtike /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:652: tattu viśeṣaṇavidhikalpanayā krayaṃ pratyevetyevamekavākyatvasaṃbhave na vākyabhedamaṅgīkṛtya adhyāhārādinā prākaraṇikasarvadravyāṅgatvakalpanaṃ yuktam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:656: evañca ekahāyanīpadasāmānādhikaraṇyādekahāyanīdravyaparicchedadvāraniyame sati na krayadravyāntareṣu tasya niveśa ityāha ---------- ataśceti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:657: nanu yanmate krayaikatvaṃ tanmate apūrvasādhanībhūtadravyaprāptyanukūlavyāpārasādhanatvāviśeṣāt vāsaḥprabhṛtiṣvapi āruṇya prāptyāpattirityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati --------- naceti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:662: natu bhaṭṭasomeśvaroktarītyā ekaḥ kraya iti tattadvyāpārakasādhanatānāṃ naikahāyanīdharmatvaprāptirityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:663: utpattiśiṣṭānāmapi guṇānāmekavikretānativaśātsamuccayopapattau virodhābhāvānna bhedakateti taduktopapattimāśaṅkya nirākaroti -------- naceti
GSP28jsbh3-1u:670: aviruddhadharmāntarāṇāṃ tu vākyāntarīyatvāt avāntaraprakaraṇena sarvakrayāṅgatvamiti śeṣa ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:673: nahi tatraikahāyanyuddeśyā yena tatsvarūpamānarthakyabhiyā na vivakṣyate /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:674: tṛtīyayā krayaṃ prati aṅgatvena tasyāḥ dvāramātratvāt /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:676: dvārābhāve uddeśyasadbhāvamātreṇa dharmaprāptau kṛṣṇaleṣvavaghātāpattirityata āha ---------- yathācaivamiti //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:683: ataeva śvetādiguṇāntarasādhyakrayasthalepyekahāyanīparicchedakatvāvirodhastatra kimu vaktavyam dvārasya tattvena dvārateti yuktā tatra dharmaprāptiriti kaustubhe draṣṭavyamiti /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:694: ataścaikasyaiva grahasya saṃmārga iti prāpte -------- yatra hi samāsādau parasparānvayo vyutpanno yathāśvābhidhānīṃ yatkiñcitsomaliptamityādau,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:696: yatra tu sa na vyutpannastatra parasparānvayena viśiṣṭoddeśe avyutpannānvayanibandhanavākyabhedāpatterna viśiṣṭoddeśaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:700: ekavacanādyupāttasaṅkhyādestu samānābhidhānaśrutyā karaṇatvakarmatvādirūpe pratyayārtha evānvitasya padaśrutyā prātipadikārthānvayo naiva vyutpannaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:702: prātipadikādeva sāhityapratītistatrāpi sāhityasya pratyayārtha evānvayo na prātipadikārtha
GSP28jsbh3-1u:706: karmatvādāvanvayena taddvārā bhāvanānvayopapatteḥ saṃmārgasya pārṣṭhikoddeśyadvayasaṃbandhe bādhakābhāvaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:713: paśutvena viniyuktasyāpi lohitādeḥ saṃskāryatvavad bahutvāvacchedena viniyuktasyāpi grahasyaikatvāvacchedena saṃskāryatvopapatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:714: naca -------- evamapi dvayoruddeśyayoreka pradhānakriyāvaśīkārābhāvātkathaṃ parasparānvayaniyama iti -------- vācyam;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:715: vaikṛtāṅgavadguṇānurodhenāpi padaśrutyaiva vā pradhānayorapyākāṅkṣāṃ prakalpya tadupapatteḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:716: iṣyate ca yatra bhinnavākyasthale āgneyaṃ caturdhā karoti,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:717: puroḍāśaṃ caturdhā karotītyādau guṇānurodhena pradhānayorabhedānvayastatraikavākyasthale sutarāṃ śābdabodhe mukhyaviśeṣyabhūtakriyayā vaśīkāraḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:718: ekatvāvivakṣāpekṣayā ca vaśīkārakalpanāyāṃ na ko 'pi doṣaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:722: atra sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsāvityādau satyapi putratvapaśutvādīnāṃ karmatvaparyāptyadhikaraṇatāvacchedakānāṃ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:723: dharmāṇāṃ bhede ekenaiva sarvapadena yugapad bodhānnaikakarmakatvahānirityādyaṃ viṣayetyantam /

GSP28jsbh3-1u:763: saṃmārgaviniyogaḥ siddho 'pi kimekatvādiviśiṣṭe uta grahamātre veti viśeṣato viniyogaprakāro vaktavyaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:764: tatra yadyapi apūrvasādhanatvenaiva rūpeṇa viniyogastathāpi tallakṣaṇopayogiśakyasaṃbandhaghaṭakatāmātramevoddeśyatāvacchedakatadanavacchedakatādvāreṇa cintyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:769: tataścānuṣṭhānānanuṣṭhānarūpaphalahetukavidhitsitāvidhitsitāparaparyāyau vidhisaṃsparśāsaṃsparśāveveha vivakṣitāvivakṣitapadābhyāṃ vivakṣitau kṛtvā vicāra ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:770: tatra grahaprātipadikasya grahatvamartho vacanasya ekatvaṃ dvitīyāyāḥ karmatvaṃ ca /

GSP28jsbh3-1u:773: grahādeḥ karmatve anvayādyathā grahatvānavacchinne na saṃmārgastathaikatvānavacchinne 'pi na saḥ /

GSP28jsbh3-1u:802: kriyāyāṃ hi guṇatvenānvaye tadīyākāṅkṣayā saṃbandhādyathāpekṣamanyonyaniyamaḥ sidhyati /

GSP28jsbh3-1u:843: mantreṇahi prakaraṇe pāṭhāddarśapūrṇamāsāpūrvaṃ pratyupakartavyam kenaciddvāreṇeti niścite yadeva darśapūrṇamāsāpūrve upayujyate tadeva dvāraṃ bhavati /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:852: paśvaikatvādestu karaṇatve 'nvitasya taddvārā kriyāsaṃbandhena vidhyanvaye vākyabhedādidoṣānāpatteḥ yuktā vivakṣeti vaiṣamyamityarthaḥ //

GSP28jsbh3-1u:980: tasyacāprākṛtakāryakaratvāpatteḥ vājapeye sādhanatvādinā niveśāyogāt ṣaṣṭhyāḥ paraṃparāsaṃbandhe

GSP28jsbh3-1u:1011: prakṛte tu homānuvādena vihite 'bhikramaṇe homasvarūpe ānarthakyaprasaktau apūrvasādhanatvalakṣaṇātātparyagrāhakatayā vācanikāṅgasandaṃśarūpāvāntarādhikāra eva tattvenāśrīyate,

GSP28jsbh3-1u:1016: prakṣepāṅgakasyaiva tyāgasya vṛddhavyavahāreṇa yajipadārthatvāvasāyādākṣepeṇa śrūyamāṇayajimātre homaprāptyupapatteḥ // 3 // 10 //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1019: spaṣṭāyāṃ yadyapyabhikramaṇopavyānayostadaṅgāvatāre sati saṃskāratvāpatteḥ saṃmārgākhyasaṃskāracintānantarameveyaṃ cintā kartuṃ yuktā;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1020: tathāpi kriyāyāḥ sākṣāt kriyānvayāyogāt guṇavatkriyāsādhanadravyadvārā kriyānvayenārthāt

GSP28jsbh3-1u:1047: anantarā tu sākṣātpradhānāṅge homāṅgatvaśravaṇena bādhite tadviśeṣacintātvādavasararūpā spaṣṭaiva /

GSP28jsbh3-1u:1057: yadi pradhānetikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā prayājānāmaṅgatvena grahaṇe tena kratūpakārabhāvyakatvāvagatesteṣāmitikartavyatākāṅkṣā kalpyeta,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1061: nanu bhāvanāsvābhāvyena utpadyamānaprayājādīnāmaṅgākāṅkṣā upajīvyena prathamapravattena pradhānakathaṃbhāvena pratibaddheti na tayā parasparāṅgatvam

GSP28jsbh3-1u:1512: paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇoktarītyā agnidevatātvasya kārakatāsaṃbandhena bhāvanāyāmanvayasya vyutpannatvāt dravye 'nvaye 'vyutpannānvayanibandhanavākyabhedāpattirityarthaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1527: yathaiva 'ghaṭapaṭāvānaye' tyatra karmatvaṃ dvandvānte vibhakteḥ śrūyamāṇatvāt pratyekaṃ bhavati /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1532: tena dampatyoḥ kartṛtvasyeva devatātvasyāpyakhaṇḍopādhirūpasya vyāsaktatvāvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1533: ghaṭapaṭāvityatra tu tayoruddeśyatvena tatsāhityasyāvivakṣitatvāt tatra pratyekameva karmatvaṃ yuktamiti vaiṣamyopapādanāyāha ---------- ata eveti /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1540: nanu evamapi vakṣyamāṇaśātapathaśrutimūlena “ubhau vā aviśeṣādi“ti kātyāyanavacanena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1541: agnīṣomīye 'pi tatprāpteḥ kathaṃ tasya āgneyamātraviṣayatāsiddhirityato niyāmakamāha
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1543: “taṃ caturdhākṛtvā puroḍāśaṃ barhiṣadaṃ karotī“ti śatapathagataṃ vākyaṃ tacchabdena puroḍāśaparāmarśena puroḍāśamātrasya caturdhākaraṇavidhāyakamevārthato dhṛtam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1544: etādṛśopasaṃhārānaṅgīkāre śākhāntarīyatve 'pi pratyakṣavākyavihitasya puroḍāśamātracaturdhākaraṇasya sarvathā bādhāyogāt vikalpāpattiḥ,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1554: kathaṃ tasya tadviṣaye sāmānyavidhitvaṃ iti ------- vācyam;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1556: etena ------ parasparopasaṃhāre sāmānyavidhisārthakyasaṃbhave 'pi anyataropasaṃhāre sāmānyavidhivaiyarthyamapi ------- parihṛtam;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1563: viśeṣataḥ prāptatve 'pi sarvapuroḍāśapratipattitvena vidhitvasaṃbhave anuvādatvāyogāt tena viśeṣaparyavasāyitvānupapatteḥ /
